page.title: 15A HUNDRED YEARS FROM NOW.
page.content: {THE RAILWAY STATION BRIDGE.}L.Ashman. I love to stand on top of the railway station bridge especially when a train is approaching.If you stand in a certain spot,it feels as if the train will run over you.I get scared and run screaming down the stairs. {VIEWS WOOD.}D.Nicholls,H.Knight. I hope that in a hundred years from now,Views Wood will be just as I remember.I love to hear the crunch of the leaves and the birds singing.I like to see the blossom on the trees and the blackberries on the bushes.I hope it won't disappear. {THE RIVER UCK.}I.Chappell. The luxury of the river I enjoy. Fishing in the peace and quiet with the gurgling of the river and the swishing trees.The river is a murky brown but there are many fish.
